root.name: Zombie Virus
root.description: Zombie Virus, titled The Zombie vs. Kyuukyuusha in the Japanese release, is the 95th volume of the Simple Series 2000 line of budget titles. The game takes place in a city whose residents have been infected with a biological weapon from an enemy state, turning them into zombies. You take to the wheels of an ambulance and must flee the town, avoiding zombies (or running them over) and saving victims along the way. You'll be able to beef up your ambulance by rescuing skilled workers.
